text: Ani musa krodha ra duhkhako avasthama aphno samudayatira pharkera a'e ra bhanna thale ki he mero samudayaka manisaharu ke timro palanakartale timila'i ramro vacana di'eko thi'ena? Ke usako tarphabata a'une maddata timila'i lamo pratita bhayo va timile cahyau ki timimathi timro palanakartako tarphabata prakopa parosa? Ra (yasaikaranale) timile masita juna vaca gareka thiyau tyasako ullanghana garyau
